wikipedia_page.main: Darren Horrigan (born 2 June 1983) is an English footballer who played in the Football League for Lincoln City. A goalkeeper born in Middlesbrough, Horrigan began his career with Birmingham City, and went on to play non-League football for clubs including Stamford Town, Cambridge City, Ilkeston Town, Spennymoor United, Scarborough, Gateshead, Bishop Auckland and Tow Law Town.
